name: auckland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the northern part of New Zealand: The rate of infection in Central Auckland was lower compared to North Auckland. This work was supported by a University of Auckland research grant.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Auckland the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Auckland.Gardner is a freelance composer, broadcaster, performer, and lecturer based in Auckland, New Zealand.An earlier wave of immigration, beginning in the 1960s, led to the establishment of large communities in Auckland of Pasifika peoples.
